scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, identified as a Pope by his tiara and vestments, is seated on an ornate, gilded throne. He is depicted in profile, looking down at a book resting on a lectern before him. The book is richly decorated with floral patterns. Behind the Pope, a grey wall with arched windows is visible, suggesting an interior architectural setting. The scene is framed by a decorative border of foliage and blue and gold motifs, typical of illuminated manuscripts.
